title: Bioelectrochemically enhanced autotrophic Feammox for ammonium removal via the Fe(II)/Fe(III) cycle
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1355-1364
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00074A, Paper
Tuo Wang, Jiayao Zhang, Ziyuan Wang, Qian Zhao, Yue Wu, Nan Li, Xinlei Jiang, Xin Wang
The electrochemically assisted autotrophic Feammox achieves a faster rate of ammonium oxidation through iron cycling with an optimal applied voltage of 0.6 V.
